project.name: Meta-Ralph: Self-Improvement
project.description: RALPH-AGI improving itself - adding a dry-run feature to preview task selection without LLM calls

features.description: Add a --dry-run flag to the CLI that shows which task would be selected and what context would be sent to the LLM, without actually making any LLM API calls
steps: Add --dry-run / -n flag to the 'run' subcommand in ralph_agi/cli.py
When --dry-run is set, load the PRD and select the next task using TaskSelector
Print the selected task ID, description, and acceptance criteria
Print a summary of what would be sent to the LLM (task context, available tools)
Exit without making any LLM API calls
Add a test in tests/test_cli.py to verify dry-run works
acceptance_criteria: Running 'ralph-agi run --dry-run --prd PRD.json' shows the next task without calling any LLM
Output includes task ID and description
Output shows available tools that would be used
No API calls are made (can verify by running without API keys set)
